comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: coinman76 on July 28, 2023, 04:39:08 PMWhat is the latest version supported by Windows 7?This is not advisable since windows 8.1 and above is the recommended OS to use for electrum wallet and using old version might exposed you some risk since some of Electrum updates might be related to issues found on old version.You can use this thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5391269.0 as reference to your concern.Version 4.1.5 is the last version supported by Windows 7 as per @Charles-tim thread https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5391269.msg59633634#msg59633634

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: coinman76 on July 28, 2023, 04:39:08 PMWhat is the latest version supported by Windows 7?You have already received your answer, but I would like to strongly encourage you to seriously consider upgrading your operating system. Microsoft ditched support for Windows 7 a long time ago. That means no new patches or security fixes, leaving your system vulnerable to potential attacks whenever a new vulnerability is discovered. If your hardware cannot handle newer Windows versions, I recommend migrating to a Linux OS. It works well on older hardware, receives regular updates, and is generally less susceptible to security threats.
